name: Looper Cooper [LD47]
description:
* HOW TO PLAY *

Controls: Use Up/Down Axis (W/S or Up/Down Arrow) to steer plane. Down is up, up is down, just like on a real plane.

You are Looper Cooper. You score points by flying close to the ground, and even more points to fly close to objects like buildings, trees, rocks, and hills. You have three lives to score as many points as you can!

You can also loop around presents, if they pop, you get another 1000 points! Be aware, don't collide with the presents - they are rock solid.
